title: Oasis Reservation | Language and Culture Learning Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Language and Culture Learning Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Language and Culture Learning Center      Language and Culture Learning Center   Main Menu    About           What We Do    Who We Are    Affiliate Language Centers         Peer Tutoring           What is Peer Tutoring?    Meet Our Tutors    Tutoring Schedule (ONLINE as of 3/16)    For Students (Tips and Resources)    Become a Tutor    Peer Tutoring Blog    Tutoring FAQ    Contact Peer Tutoring         Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours    Film Series    Special Events         Language StorieS    For Instructors           Professional Development    Instructor Resources    COVID-19 Resources         Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation          Eyebrow menu    lcsl.uic.edu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Language and Culture Learning Center    Contact    Oasis Reservation        Oasis Reservation  To reserve the Language Oasis (GH 308) please fill out the form below:  You can also send us an email .      Reserve the Oasis   Name    First     Last   Role (Faculty, TA, GA, etc.) * Required Department/ Program * Required E-Mail * Required I want to reserve the Oasis for (select one): * Required a special event during the regular hours (9am-5pm) a special event outside of the regular hours a regular/repeating event (e.g. Film Series, Conversation Hours) during the regular hours Name of the Event * Required Date of the event - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   Start Time of the Event * Required    :  HH     MM    AM/PM  AM  PM    End Time of the Event * Required    :  HH     MM    AM/PM  AM  PM    Day and time alternative * Required We will do everything to reserve the Oasis at your preferred date and time. However, in case we are unable to do that, what are the other days and times that would work for your event? Estimated Number of Participants * Required Equipment and miscellaneous * Required Select which equipment you require as well as other tools/amenities that you would like to add to your reservation. If you need something that is not listed, please indicate it in "other" below.   Computer and projector    Big screen    Oasis TV (instead of the big screen)    Loud speakers    Microphone (to be used as the only output source)    Microphone with an additional output source (e.g. for Karaoke or similar events when you want to hear the voice from the microphone AND the voice from the computer)    Photo Camera    Video Camera    Popcorn Machine only (no pre-made popcorn)    Fresh popcorn (pre-made) and popcorn machine    Coffee cart    Other (specify below)  Other If you selected "other" above, please indicate what other equipment or amenities you need with your reservation. Who will host the event? * Required Just me Me and someone else Someone else Name of the (co)host: If you indicated that someone else will host the event with or without you, please enter their name here.    First     Last   Name of another co-host (optional):    First     Last   Other comments and information Please tell us anything else that you think is important about your reservation. Name This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.    Save and Continue Later             This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.          Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation             Peer Tutoring Contact Information  Click here if you have questions about our Peer Tutoring in French, German, Spanish, or Italian.      General Inquiries to LCLC  If you have a general inquiry to LCLC or are not sure which category it fits, send us an email here.      Equipment Reservation  The LCLC has a wide variety of equipment for language instructors and TAs. Click here to reserve equipment for your classroom or event.      School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics  The School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics (LCSL) is home to six independent departments, three academic programs, and the Sandi Port Errant Language and Culture Learning Center.
